website_summaries.verdict: A remote control is just one bonus to this powerful radio.
pros: Double-DIN radio offers Bluetooth for hands-free calling and streaming your favorite tunes
Fully customizable RGB interface allows for both day and night modes
cons: A few users reported issues with Bluetooth

website_summaries.verdict: The aftermarket JVC stereo system for true audiophiles. Comes with more control over the sound output than other options.
pros: The in-depth equalization settings include a 13-band EQ to customize the sound profile
An included wire harness makes installation easier since soldering isn't required
cons: Smart device controls are difficult to access and use while driving

customer_reviews.title: I'm happy. I would definitely buy it again.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a replacement to my factory deck. I bought a refurbished version. No issues so far and I'm very happy with the deck. The Bluetooth seemed Weird setting up because you don't sync through the BT option. You do it the the intitalize option. After that everything Note... Turn of the "demo" display setting. It'll drive you crazy because it flashes in every color possible.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Very nice budget addition
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice unit easy to install. Just remember to get the right mount kit for your car because I didn't knew at the time until I checked more YouTube videos in how to and my adaoter kit to filly the sides in my Toyota Highlander.
customer_reviews.author: Rafael Alsina

customer_reviews.title: Good basic touchscreen radio
customer_reviews.text: Nice little small unit. Easy install everything works well. Connects easy sounds good. Major issue I don't like is volume buttons. I would rather it be a knob to turn up and down easier. If you want to turn it up or down. You have to press it multiple times. Does not respond quickly. Then on some models of stereos you can hold the mute down and will cut volume in half this don't. Otherwise it's a pretty good unit. Good basic touchscreen radio.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Should have listened to my wife and save more money :( for a better unit
customer_reviews.text: What's good about this radio it's cheap . Play music from USB drives. Bluetooth. The radio works..... Crossover for the subs work okay What's bad The volume is difficult to use, I even purchase the remote separately. Volume will only go up one for one press...... Will go down if you hold the down button fine but not for up The equalizer EQ is barely functional.. I'm not quite sure if it does anything at all truthfully
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Teel

customer_reviews.title: A lot of band for the buck
customer_reviews.text: Got this to put in my 2007 HHR, Didn't want to spend a ton of money, Yet wanted good quality sound for my drive time, This fit the bill, Paired with some decent Pioneer speakers and I am a happy camper, Love the Bluetooth calling as well, Has worked very well for me so far, As with most replacement car stereos it could be brighter during day time driving, But its nothing that wasn't expected. For the money I think this unit provides a lot of punch and quality of sound, Hard to beat for the price IMO.
customer_reviews.author: Scott in Newton

customer_reviews.title: bought a second unit to install in wife's car.
customer_reviews.text: perfect fit on my 2010 Tacoma, fairly standard installations and wiring, everything I need to upgrade my sound system plus blue tooth, you will need to order wiring harness for your car and in my case I also got a double din dash kit for my Tacoma, took me (entry level on electricals) about 2 hours to installed (without the backup camera), all works as expected and very pleased with the purchase, just wish I had upgraded sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Chang

customer_reviews.title: It looks really nice, but it doesn't perform well
customer_reviews.text: This radio has more problems than any radio I have seen. It doesn't pick up stations well. It will connect to Pandora on its own, even when you don't want it to. If you have your phone plugged in and forget to turn it off, before turning the car off it will freeze your phone. We even had this professionally installed. It looks really nice, but it doesn't perform well.
customer_reviews.author: KT

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth disconnects
customer_reviews.text: After a year and a half, the Bluetooth now disconnects from my phone when ever it wants to....not very reliable. I took the soundbot out of my other car and have been using that for Bluetooth connectivity flawlessly. I guess I will look into an new stereo in the meantime. Very disappointing, I grew up remembering brands like JVC and Toshiba were among the best and most reliable brands....I guess times have changed!
customer_reviews.author: jlewis79

customer_reviews.title: Weird clock issue *fixed*
customer_reviews.text: I love this little radio it plays nice with everything and have gotten a lot of positive feedback. However the clock has a mind of its own. I'll set it and look at it again a mile down the road and the time is way off again. It's really the only thing holding me back from giving this thing a 5 star. Update: I figured out what the clock issue was. You can tell the clock to read the time off your phone and automatically update its own clock. I turned this off and viola no more clock issues.
customer_reviews.author: Josh H.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: Installed in my 2013 Kia Forte. Doubled stock wattage from head unit to speakers. Clear sound, super fast Bluetooth connection.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: I just wanted to replace my factory radio
customer_reviews.text: Well I very much like the stereo. But I am a 41-year-old gentleman so I don't know if it's state of the art or cutting-edge. I was not looking for big bass sound or over-the-top noise. I was just looking for a radio with Bluetooth capability and a working CD player. I would definitely rated this product five stars. Except for one thing the special feature function System to get to bass,display,Bluetooth on off or anything is all a one button control. It's a little difficult not very user friendly. I think it works great & sounds fantastic. So that's why rated it four stars if it would've been on the sound quality it would've definitely been a five
customer_reviews.author: kyle oldendorph

customer_reviews.title: Great unit. I loaded up 30 GB worth of ...
customer_reviews.text: Great unit. I loaded up 30 GB worth of music on a tiny USB flash drive and it does a great job. Definitely an upgrade over my stock stereo (2005 Subaru Forester XT). Only complaint so far is that occasionally it will take a while to start reading the thumb drive when I start the car, or the first song played when I start the car skips a bit at first. If I pause the song and give it a few seconds the music plays normally. This has happened maybe 2-3 times in several months of ownership.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle D.

customer_reviews.title: Junk! Don’t buy!
customer_reviews.text: Had the radio installed. Worked for less than 1 month in my sons car. Stopped turning on at all. Took it back to installer and they checked to make sure everything was installed and they said it was no good. Spent all this time and money on a peice of junk. If there was a negative star I would use it. This was my sons Christmas present. Disappointing
customer_reviews.author: April Manns

customer_reviews.title: Nice head unit
customer_reviews.text: Good head unit for the money. I'm a little disappointed it doesn't have more features and you can't really customize colors or anything on the home screen but over all nice unit and great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Harsch

customer_reviews.title: Ok for the money
customer_reviews.text: Honestly for the money I payed it’s an OK product, the screen is definitely outdated and has several issues, but to use just as a radio station it’s worth the money, I bought mine open box and was missing several parts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with this unit
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this unit. I've read others having issues with clock keeping time we've had no issues just turned off time sync. Bluetooth works amazing. I'm running jbl speakers and jbl subs and this unit powers them with ease excellent sound. Easy to install with vehicle adapter gonna buy another unit for other vehicle I'm so pleased with this unit
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Connection to my truck was easy as well
customer_reviews.text: Works very well in my 06 Colorado. The look and feel of the set compliment the interior very well. Connection to my truck was easy as well. Just needed some Youtube training and I installed this system in 30 minutes. (with additional hardware purchased here on Amazon) I ordered this radio, 4 speakers and the hardware to connect them all. I saved 25 bucks ordering on Amazon instead of Crutchfield, and I saved over 200 dollars over installation and purchasing the items at Bestbuy. Very simple to do yourself, and you feel more accomplished.
customer_reviews.author: Evan P

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointing product.
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this radio, two months later it stopped working completely. Had a replacement radio shipped. Now months later the new one it stopped won’t turn on. Only making horrible clicking noises. And now, it is out of the return window and we are stuck with another non working radio. Very upset! Very disappointed! I would not recommend this radio.
customer_reviews.author: joekelly97

customer_reviews.title: Fits 2006 chevy colorado
customer_reviews.text: For the money its a pretty good unit. There is a few things in the software id like to change like the order of things that are listed but i think there more personal preference things and cant relay blame the company for that. the only real complaint i have is that i wish it was a little brighter. when driving during the day it can be tough to read the display due to glare from the sun. And at night it a little to bright. a dimmer switch on the face would be amazing but even just the option in the menu would be greatly appreciated.
customer_reviews.author: J K

customer_reviews.title: A FIRST CLASS PRODUCT WITH NO DOWNSIDE!
customer_reviews.text: Have lived with this product for five months now. It is excellent! Great reception and looks great. The Bluetooth hands-free for your smartphone is clear and crisp on both ends. I did pay to have it installed, and I truly think most of the issues you see here in other reviews are related to not connecting it correctly. I LOVE MINE!!!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Rehling

customer_reviews.title: Nice mid-level deck - For $115 - it is a very good deal.
customer_reviews.text: Nice mid-level deck - does everything well except UI is really quirky and takes some getting used to - and can be a PIA. JVC should have added a few actual hardware buttons - they would have made this so much easier to use and setup. ound? very good for the $$, radio has good reception, USB works great, cell phone Buetooth interface works very well - better than it does in my Ford factory $500 Shaker/Sync deck in my Mustang. Good bass, clear highs (as much as I can hear them anymore) For $115 - it is a very good deal.
customer_reviews.author: John McIntyre

customer_reviews.title: Great replacement for stock radio without breaking the bank.
customer_reviews.text: Good feature at a great price. I bought this specifically for the Bluetooth phone and Sirius radio abilities. The install was somewhat difficult in my 199 Suburban, the dash needs to be trimmed to allow radio to sit flush. Then the dash bezel needs to be modified to fit. Definitely not a plug and play in your Chevy truck.
customer_reviews.author: JimmyM

customer_reviews.title: Great stereo
customer_reviews.text: We replaced our boat stereo and this was instantly clearer, Easy to install and Easy to use. Nice screen. Good size
customer_reviews.author: Kelly H

customer_reviews.title: Everything on my end is fine and I've had countless other head units work without ...
customer_reviews.text: I will be attempting to return this product as it is having constant electrical issues. Everything on my end is fine and I've had countless other head units work without hiccups. I'm not the only one having issues with this radio constantly restarting itself. So frustrating!
customer_reviews.author: Slurm

customer_reviews.title: Great unit for the price
customer_reviews.text: It's a great unit for the price. We're experiencing an issue that causes the clock to go back 30 minutes randomly when we turn the car off, for some reason, otherwise I'd give this product 5/5 stars. The color options for the buttons/display are great, and my wife's favorite feature. The Bluetooth works, the aux port works, and the USB port works. Overall, very pleased with this head unit.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Gillen

customer_reviews.title: Awesome stereo
customer_reviews.text: I have had many car stereos but this BADBOY takes the cake. it has whatever you need to make music play usb cd aux Bluetooth and it has am/fm settings as well as Pandora and I heart radio honestly I would buy this stereo again in fact I might install one in my Girlfriends car. Awesome stereo
customer_reviews.author: timothy kinney

customer_reviews.title: A little disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Nice unit but the resistive touch screen isn’t the best you have to tap it a hundred times to turn down the volume No automatic dimmer you have to adjust manually And no remote/also freezes sometimes
customer_reviews.author: david delatorre morales

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Bought this radio to install in my teenage son’s car. Easy to wire, simple to use. Sounds & looks great in his car.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Glore

customer_reviews.title: Radio Reception Much Improved over OEM
customer_reviews.text: Radio reception much better than factory radio in my 2003 Outback. Sound is more clear and richer too in both radio and CD. Purchase was primarily due to a failed cd player in factory radio. Am very pleased with product and was a great price too. Self install was a breeze with assist of YouTube videos.
customer_reviews.author: Kmick46

customer_reviews.title: Foggy Screen
customer_reviews.text: I've had this stereo for over a year now and the screen went foggy on me. I was very happy up until now. Everything functions great, just can't see the screen too well now that condensation is inside. No cracks or anything that I did to the screen. Unit looks like new, but still fogged on the inside. Would love a replacement, but that option isn't available anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Very nice deck, nice screen
customer_reviews.text: love most of the deck, hate the volume control, I usually only buy turn knob volume but the rest was to nice to avoid.
customer_reviews.author: Tummys10

customer_reviews.title: This stereo is awesome!! I'm still learning everything about it but ...
customer_reviews.text: This stereo is awesome!! I'm still learning everything about it but so far so great! The only thing is that there's a glitch with my Samsung Note Android phone being able to sync to IHeart radio through Bluetooth like Pandora, but if push comes to shove you can always listen to IHeart through your phone via AUX. It looks great in my car, and I love all the colorful lights! My girlfriend is gonna buy one! I highly recommend this stereo.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie F.

customer_reviews.title: High recommended
customer_reviews.text: I installed this in a 2006 Nissan Frontier. Aside from a rather tricky install due to missing factory mounts, the unit itself works perfectly for my needs. I keep an iPod Touch in the center console that is hooked up to it via bluetooth and it has stayed connected and functional since I purchased it. It does take a bit to turn on after the vehicle has started, and I wish that it would automatically play the last track over bluetooth (it starts paused) but those are very nitpicky issues. Overall this has been a great purchase, highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I installed it in my Honda crv and it works great. The screen is really bright even on night time mode, but over all a great radio.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Albertson

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. Bought for my son's 17th birthday. He loves it. Being able to change the colors in three areas is awesome. Bluetooth works perfectly with Samsung S7 edge. Well worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Unlike my older unit it actually reads the artist and the name of the song.
customer_reviews.text: I did not like the fact that the product did not come with a remote control. And it only had a single output for the subwoofer. I had to purchase a y adapter for proper connection. It also has a mic wire to run, I guess for the Bluetooth. And it also has a USB wire to run instead of a port built-in the unit itself.
customer_reviews.author: Khayree

customer_reviews.title: Great, if you don't have to remove power from it often (travel trailer).
customer_reviews.text: Great stereo. But, I put it in my travel trailer & every time I disconnect the battery for trailer storage, the stereo resets to the annoying "demo" mode, where it goes through crazy flashing light displays & the beep mode, where the annoying beep occurs, with every button pushed.
customer_reviews.author: J. Heaton

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Once I read the manual and was able to change factory settings such as clock and display, everything else has operated as expected. I was able to find a YouTube video with step by step instructions on how to install this radio on my 2001 Nissan Xterra. I’m satisfied with this product based on the price I paid for.
customer_reviews.author: John tobon

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great looking in dash. On time delivery. Installed easily and functions flawlessly. A++++ Amazing how much difference a good stereo mames.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Jaecques

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great jvc radio would recommend this unit had a boss what junk
customer_reviews.author: mark

customer_reviews.title: For the money, worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Only problem I have is every other month I’ll start my car and sound won’t come out. The head unit is on and everything but no sound. Most time I just cut my car off and start it back and it’s fine but I have had to use the restart button one or twice. All in all for the money a high end unit for sound.
customer_reviews.author: Bailey

customer_reviews.title: So much better than the ugly stock unit
customer_reviews.text: It works well. So much better than the ugly stock unit. Easy-ish to adjust and set up. Used in a '08 Ford escape.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: ... met my expectations however the specifications are explicit to smart phones and fail to mention the broader range of ...
customer_reviews.text: Product met my expectations however the specifications are explicit to smart phones and fail to mention the broader range of communications devices that can be accommodated.
customer_reviews.author: Robert W. Hibbard

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Great product, easy blue tooth capability, multitudes of speaker options, easy interface, great sound.
customer_reviews.author: GM fixer

customer_reviews.title: My JVC radio was the best for the money
customer_reviews.text: My JVC radio was the best for the money, I've tried the other brands, literally, I bought other brands installed them and return them, JVC won me over, it performs great, and it was the only radio that came with the microphone for the Bluetooth so you can answer your phone at the push of a button, I absolutely give JVC five stars, thanks, Bert B.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's a decent head unit but I wish the blue-tooth range.
customer_reviews.text: It's a decent head unit. I wish the blue-tooth range was a bit better, I use ir in my RV and I cant be more than 10 feet from it without it breaking up. The one in my truck works from 30ft away. The lights are a little too much but can be toned down. The system overall is good for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Ron D'Angelo

customer_reviews.title: frustrating.
customer_reviews.text: Defaults to pandora when you plug in your phone, and if you are trying to play audio from a different source it does strange things. If you try to adjust the volume it switches back to pandora. You need to change the "mode" from "app" to "head mode" every time you reconnect your iphone.
customer_reviews.author: STEPHEN J BINGEN JR

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great I replaced my eclipse radio with it and it makes a huge difference
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Uriah Myers

customer_reviews.title: Its doing the job
customer_reviews.text: For The Price you cant really complain. Its still working for the Teen since Christmas day 2015.
customer_reviews.author: R.Chevalier

customer_reviews.title: Easy hands free receding of calls
customer_reviews.text: It's been a month and I'm still loving this! I use the Bluetooth the most, enjoying all of the music from my phone. Easy hands free receding of calls. Calling out a bit trickier, but I speak into the mic to dial out and most time it works. Great sounds, great pre set EQs.
customer_reviews.author: L. Greig

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't recommend
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this radio thinking it would be in comparison to my JVC KD-X350BTS 1-Din. Boy was I disappointed! Only one sub output, basic EQ settings, volume is low until you hit 30. I'm disappointed
customer_reviews.author: KMcLemore

customer_reviews.title: Bought this stereo for my daughters car and she loves ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this stereo for my daughters car and she loves it, she loves how it lights up in the different colors, that she can charge her phone and most importantly that she can bluetooth her phone for handsfree driving.
customer_reviews.author: Ashbriche

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: I love this receiver, I've been going back and forth with many receivers, JVC-KDR530>JVC-KDR-X330BTS> Dual XRM405BT> Pioneer MVH-330BT> Boss Touchscreen BV9364B. All of which I had one or more issues with or simply wasn't satisfied. This radio satisfies me and I have no desire to switch it for another one. JVC Did it again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it! It was kinda hard to manage
customer_reviews.text: Ecstatic! Love it! It was kinda hard to manage . it was pretty technical but i got use to it ! Loved the color display, Bluetooth, and speaker for incoming calls. I'm head over heels for it. I'm very happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Karo

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good unit
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good unit. Love some of the features like day/night/menu colors can all be set different. Easy to get going and easy to use. Have a different model jvc unit in another car and am as equally please with this brand. Will most likely buy in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Prochaska

customer_reviews.title: Mother in law is satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: installed in my motherinlaw's 2012 Suzuki and she likes it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: T.D.H.S.

customer_reviews.title: Although the color scheme for it good be a bit more customizable
customer_reviews.text: Installed this in my Wife's 2012 Chevy Sonic and she loves it! Although the color scheme for it good be a bit more customizable. It synchs good with both her IPhone 6 and my HTC Desire. If you are looking for a good priced radio that is not to fancy I would choose this one!
customer_reviews.author: Blake W.

customer_reviews.title: Where’s the volume knob?
customer_reviews.text: Great sound nice quality just wish it had a volume knob... the volume is touch screen and sometimes it’s hard to turn it up/down while driving. Overall great product though.
customer_reviews.author: Jose M.

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, sounds great (after looking through all of the ...
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, sounds great (after looking through all of the settings and making a few adjustments) pretty easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Ballard McCleskey

customer_reviews.title: Works good, looks nice but if you shut off your ...
customer_reviews.text: Works good, looks nice but if you shut off your vehicle while its trying to pair it freaks out and doesnt play sound unless you disconnect the battery. maybe its just mine, who knows, i would like it to be faster though. takes forever to pair or read a usb.
customer_reviews.author: AndrewV

customer_reviews.title: This stereo is a great buy for the price
customer_reviews.text: This stereo is a great buy for the price. Im loving it so far. Also the amount of features and settings is amazing, and even without an external amp it powers my kicker door speaker with ease.
customer_reviews.author: The Mechanic

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The unit meets my expectations. The instructions are not as clear as they should be.
customer_reviews.author: PJ

customer_reviews.title: Great radio well built although I choose to send it ...
customer_reviews.text: Great radio well built although I choose to send it back for it's single din 960 bts counterpart...very much the same radio in 2 and 1 din configs...only did that cause the single fit my application better.
customer_reviews.author: Nick D.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice unit pulls stations in nicely. Cranks loud and clear for the money!
customer_reviews.author: h

customer_reviews.title: Not recommend if you have a good speaker system
customer_reviews.text: Bright and sleek design was nice. Volume is only tough which can be annoying . When playing Bluetooth volume access is only allowed on screen. Offers no bass, treble etc settings! Only 1 subwoofer input
customer_reviews.author: Tomasm

customer_reviews.title: If anyone wants a simple yet awsome upgrade for a great price this is the way to go
customer_reviews.text: Took me about 30 min to install! If anyone wants a simple yet awsome upgrade for a great price this is the way to go! I've purchased a 2nd one. Both of these fit in a 2004 nissan altima, an 2001 pathfinder. 👍
customer_reviews.author: Junior

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend this to everyone
customer_reviews.text: I would recommend this to everyone. I have a 07 vw Passat, was worried because I didn't know if what I would need to hook it up or if it would even work since I have a built in amp. 1: wire harness for my specific car, 2: something called a can bus module (if you have a built in amp or steering wheel controls. 3: and a dash kit(vehicle specific). And Boom! Works perfect and looks better than any radio (that isn't a touch screen) that I've ever saw. Buy it!!
customer_reviews.author: Devon

customer_reviews.title: and love it! It connects smoothly every time
customer_reviews.text: This is the third version of this radio I've installed in my vehicles (I've now replaced all of our car stereos with this), and love it! It connects smoothly every time, and offers more options than most anyone would ever need. The new button placement isn't as good as the previous model, but not bad.
customer_reviews.author: Jerome

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I finally installed this thing and I wish I would have done it sooner. Super easy with the harness kit and a YouTube video for my specific truck.
customer_reviews.author: cplummer17

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok
customer_reviews.text: For the price this is pretty basic no pandora or satellite radio but does have Bluetooth audio and calling
customer_reviews.author: Que

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like it, but it has a lot of features I won't use
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Everything worked great for about two months then the lights went all ...
customer_reviews.text: Everything worked great for about two months then the lights went all red and they won't change colors. I can't figure out why and it's frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: T.B.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome stereo!!!
customer_reviews.text: This stereo is awesome! Works really well and is fantastic for the price. Many customization options on the unit and it really cleans up the audio compared to the stock stereo. Bluetooth controlls are great. Great product and I would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: This stereo has suited me very well. I've had ...
customer_reviews.text: This stereo has suited me very well. I've had it for about 2 years now and haven't encountered any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Blue

customer_reviews.title: Bought it for my step sons cavalier feels like a feather but is working well tons of features ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my step sons cavalier feels like a feather but is working well tons of features and plenty of power.
customer_reviews.author: Russell Welsh

customer_reviews.title: iPod Connection takes forever
customer_reviews.text: It’s decent at best. It takes a long time to connect to my iPhone (using the USB). Also, changing volume levels isn’t that easy as you have to know where to press which can be a problem when you are driving
customer_reviews.author: Akingbade Samuel

customer_reviews.title: Excellent replacement for my stock radio in my 2002 CRV
customer_reviews.text: Excellent replacement for my stock radio in my 2002 CRV. Gotta buy an adapter, but it was fairly inexpensive at 8 bucks from advance auto parts. I didn't solder the connectors I used twist caps.
customer_reviews.author: David Gleason

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for value double din.
customer_reviews.text: Overall awesome head unit. High RMS, USB, and Bluetooth with mic and phone use.
customer_reviews.author: MajinDan

customer_reviews.title: fit my 1997 Tacoma like a glove
customer_reviews.text: It rocks, fit my 1997 Tacoma like a glove. I have a Note3 and the iheart radio app does not work. Love all the color settings you have for the screen. Best bang for the buck.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Pena

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like it a lot and keep buying. There is timeliness and the products are the same as described.
customer_reviews.author: Juan Carlos Perez Diaz

customer_reviews.title: JVC headunit
customer_reviews.text: Good value. Operating the head unit is not the easiest.
customer_reviews.author: Lim Yu Been

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice head unit. Enjoy the Bluetooth. I posted this, before using it. The Bluetooth doesn't work. If I'm listening to YouTube and turn up the volume, it changes to Pandora. It's a waste of $100. It does the same as my factory head unit. AM?FM and CD.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Hale

customer_reviews.title: Great Head Unit
customer_reviews.text: bought for my GF she Loves it, not overly complicated very simple to use and the features works well
customer_reviews.author: Mark G

customer_reviews.title: Great system
customer_reviews.text: This is a really great stereo system, I usually keep all my music on a jump drive and use it with this,
customer_reviews.author: sparky7777

customer_reviews.title: diamond in the ruff!
customer_reviews.text: works really well. Installed in uncle car for Bluetooth capability turns out unit produces sound that rivals more expensive audio units. Can even tune it acoustically. For the price it'll get you in the park.
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo Kerns

customer_reviews.title: Package looked as if it was thrown around a bunch of times
customer_reviews.text: Box was all beat up and basically opened. Product was ok but someone should learn to handle boxes more carefully
customer_reviews.author: Cody

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Its exactly what it says it is nothing more nothing less. Comes with the blue tooth mic. Works great and looks good makes my wife happy so i love it.
customer_reviews.author: Dead River 33

customer_reviews.title: Quality headnuit
customer_reviews.text: My 3rd one I bought since I buy so many cars. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Won’t keep time
customer_reviews.text: It sounds good but it will not keep the correct time. It loses about 30 minuets every day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: no play button, but easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Up to 4 devices connected (2 bluetooth, 1 AUX, and 1 USB), good radio, CD player, and an easy interface. Excellent for its price.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor L.

customer_reviews.title: Dont do it
customer_reviews.text: It didn't make it a week before quitting. Dont waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Hines

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with product and produces good sound and ample
customer_reviews.text: For the money...can't beat it. Very happy with product and produces good sound and ample power
customer_reviews.author: CharlieRVA

customer_reviews.title: Massive upgrade to 2005 stock Camry radio.
customer_reviews.text: awesome. siri/bluetooth rules. Intuitive menu. Connectiveity on 2005 camry was easy with harness purchases and wire connectors.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Peterson

customer_reviews.title: VERY HAPPY !!!
customer_reviews.text: NICE SOUND, GOOD POWER, ALL THE OPTIONS inc bluetooth, PERFECT FIT, EASY TO USE, INEXPENSIVE.
customer_reviews.author: Matty B.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this stereo! Looks great, sounds great, plays MP3s, iPod and nice USB and Bluetooth action.
customer_reviews.author: Rodceasar

customer_reviews.title: Dead radio.
customer_reviews.text: I just had my radio installed three days ago. And now it turns on and I have no sound. Trying to get a hold of the seller. With no luck. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Michael M.

customer_reviews.title: That doesn't seem like much but I hate waiting half a minute with ...
customer_reviews.text: It does everything it says it does but the bluetooth leaves much to be desired. It takes 20-30 seconds for my phone to connect every time I turn my car on. That doesn't seem like much but I hate waiting half a minute with my phone in hand before I can push play and return to my music or podcast. Also, when I watch any type of video on my phone there is a couple second lag for the sound to come through the car speakers. I would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Jason M.

customer_reviews.title: Great Deck
customer_reviews.text: Great deck, bluetooth, USB, and aux all work well. Only issue is a popping sound every time it turns on
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Good sound quality. USB, phone, disc, pandora, etc. Love it. And the colours create a nice dynamic.
customer_reviews.author: Curtis Sealy

customer_reviews.title: Great stereo for a great price.  Display is only concern
customer_reviews.text: Installed nicely in the van. 90% of my time we spent trying to align the wire scheme with the car. Wish there was an easier way. I did purchase the adapter harness. I think that is a must for any home install project. stereo works great, still working the display as it does not show well during the daytime. I may have to stick to a more visible color scheme or maybe a daytime option was missed in my setup. Bluetooth and aux options work very well.
customer_reviews.author: David and Sandra

product_meta.title: JVC KW-R920BTS Built-in Bluetooth/Satellite Radio-Ready in-Dash Receiver with Remote
product_meta.description: Style:CD ReceiverJVC KW-R920BTS CD receiver covers just about all audio bases, including digital music, streaming Internet radio, siriusxm satellite radio, and old-school music options, like CD and am/FM radio. You can take hands-free calls, as well as switch between two paired phones using its Built-in Bluetooth. This receiver also lets you set your favorite colors in three different areas on its face. Pick your display color, pick your music, and suddenly, you've got a Jukebox in your dash.
feature_bullets: Built-in MOSFET amplifier (22 watts RMS/50 peak x 4 channels)
Plays media loaded with MP3, wma, WAV, and FLAC music files
Built-in Bluetooth for hands-free calling and audio streaming
3-Zone variable color display (you can select different colors for the display and controls)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars448 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
